column1: Artificial Intelligence and Data Science MSc
column5: This MSc has been created as part of a £13 million Office for Students initiative to accelerate the number and diversity of skilled artificial intelligence (AI) and data science graduates. It has been designed from both an employer and student perspective, based on our internationally recognised research in multidisciplinary AI and Data Analytics, to provide distinctive and inclusive teaching for students from awide variety of backgrounds. As part of this, a number of £10,000 Scholarships are available for black, female and disabled
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
